items.sentence: I wonder whether or not Tom forgot to tell Mary what to do.
I wonder whether or not Tom still remembers how to do that.
I wonder whether or not Tom was able to do that by himself.
No matter how fast you drive, you won\'t get there on time.
One good thing about winter is that there are no mosquitos.
Tom\'s guilt could not be proven without the murder weapon.
Tom\'s hobbies include playing chess and collecting stamps.
It was a lot of fun singing with the kids at the orphanage.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t have anything pressing to do.
I wasn\'t as interested in doing that as Tom thought I was.
Tom said that he knew he might be allowed to do that today.
Tom never permitted Mary to play the piano after 10:00 p.m.
Tom nodded as if he understood what Mary was talking about.
Tom now knows that what he said was the wrong thing to say.
Tom dropped Mary off at the train station just before 2:30.
It was impossible for me to answer all of Tom\'s questions.
Are you sure we\'re doing what we\'re supposed to be doing?
This has been one of the driest years that we\'ve ever had.
Tom might\'ve believed you if you hadn\'t started laughing.
If I could speak French half as well as you, I\'d be happy.
How did you find out that Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
How did you know that Tom didn\'t know how to speak French?
What does this have to do with what I was saying about Tom?
I can\'t tell you where this is from because I don\'t know.
I came here today to help you do whatever needs to be done.
I just want to know what time I\'m supposed to pick Tom up.
I\'ll do whatever I can to encourage Tom to stay in school.
I was surprised when Tom told me I didn\'t need to do that.
I wouldn\'t have left early if Tom hadn\'t told me I could.
Did Tom say he thought it was a bad idea for us to do that?
Did any of you actually do what the teacher told you to do?
Tom Jackson was indicted in 2013 on drug smuggling charges.
I wish Tom would stop parking his car in front of my house.
Tom was wearing a baseball cap when I saw him this morning.
Tom apologized to Mary for the inconvenience he had caused.
Without Tom\'s help, Mary would\'ve been unable to do that.
Tom admitted the only reason he did that was for the money.
There are a lot of really good-looking people in Australia.
I want to go and change into that shirt I bought yesterday.
How many bus stops are there between your house and Tom\'s?
Many people who say they aren\'t afraid of dying are lying.
Mary doesn\'t make pie crust. She usually buys it pre-made.
It was careless of you to leave your umbrella on the train.
As far as I know, I don\'t have any relatives in Australia.
I can understand some French, but I can\'t really speak it.
I can\'t believe how bad the service at this restaurant is.
I can\'t come in to work today because I have a high fever.
Tom is willing to pay up to three hundred dollars for that.
Tom went to the refrigerator, looking for something to eat.
As soon as the results are made public, I\'ll let you know.
